output: pdf_document
---

```{r, include=F}
source('read_data.R')
students = get_student_sub()
bg = get_student_background_data(students$mellon_id)
```

```{r}
loc_data = bg[,c('distance_from_home','city_residence_app','state_residence_app','country_residence_app','zip_code_app')]
```

```{r}
head(loc_data[!is.na(loc_data$distance_from_home)&loc_data$country_residence_app=="USA",], 100)
```
It is most probably the straight line distance in miles.

```{r}
aggregate(is.na(distance_from_home) ~ country_residence_app, loc_data, FUN=mean)
```

Overall distance from home is missing in 28% of the cases.
